task-log.analysis: 1. I plan to build a system to manage spiders with job. 2. The issue blocked me for almost 2 month is caused by missing setting up config scan path. Spring may not scan components recursively.
task-log.log: Projects: Job Manager: mvn archetype:generate -DgroupId=org.richardliao -DartifactId=job-manager -Dpackage=org.richardliao.job.manger -Dversion=1.0-SNAPSHOT Job API Job Runner Spider API: mvn archetype:generate -DgroupId=org.richardliao -DartifactId=spider-api -Dpackage=org.richardliao.spider -Dversion=1.0-SNAPSHOT Extractor Data Processor Stock Spider: mvn archetype:generate -DgroupId=org.richardliao -DartifactId=stock-spider -Dpackage=org.richardliao.spider.stock -Dversion=1.0-SNAPSHOT
